ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera + EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Lens + Camera and Lens Case
Transcend 32 GB Class 10 SDHC Card + Card Reader + Memory Card Wallet + LP-E12 High Capacity Lithium-Ion Battery Pack
45x Wide Angle Lens (58mm) + 2.5x Telephoto Lens (58mm) + Snap-on Lens Cap + Capkeeper + 58mm UV Filter
50-inch Tripod + Screen Protector + Digital Camera Cleaning Kit -- Exclusive Kit by TheImagingWorld
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Lens + 32GB Card and Reader + Flash + Extra Battery + Case + Filter + Wide-Angle + Telephoto Lens + Tripod + Accessory Kit
